name: QuietCool
0:
”Alexa , ask quiet cool to turn on fan”
”Alexa , ask quiet cool to set the fan speed to high”
”Alexa , ask quiet cool to open master bedroom window”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quiet cool
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Advanced Whole House Fan is a ventilation cooling system that uses less energy than a traditional air conditioner. This energy-efficient system works by pulling cool, outdoor air into your home and out your attic vents. This helps keep the mass in your home cooler than an air conditioner can. These whisper-quiet and energy-efficient wonders are the #1 residential cooling & ventilation appliance on the market. With an Advanced Whole House fan, you’re able to turn off your most expensive appliance, air conditioning, while improving the air quality and comfort of your home for just pennies per hour.

For the QuietCool system, you can now use Alexa to control the fan and windows with the comfort of voice. This skill requires the smart home solution powered by QuietCool. Currently, the support includes Fans and Windows only. You would need to sign in with on QuietCool System to use the skill feature. Setup the device with the QuietCool mobile app available on the app store (Currently iOS only) and post the setup in the mobile app enable this skill and link your QuietCool account to Alexa and then Try the below supported commands. 

Alexa , ask quiet cool to turn on fan
Alexa , ask quiet cool fan to turn on
Alexa , ask quiet cool fan to turn off
Alexa , ask quiet cool to turn off fan
Alexa , ask quiet cool to set the fan mode to auto
Alexa , ask quiet cool to set the fan mode to eco
Alexa , ask quiet cool to set the fan mode to run
Alexa , ask quiet cool to set the fan speed to low
Alexa , ask quiet cool to set the fan speed to medium
Alexa , ask quiet cool to set the fan speed to high
Alexa , ask quiet cool to turn on cool mode
Alexa , ask quiet cool to turn off heat mode
Alexa , ask quiet cool to turn on heat mode
Alexa , ask quiet cool to turn off cool mode
Alexa , ask quiet cool what is the current temperature
Alexa , ask quiet cool to open master bedroom window
Alexa , ask quiet cool to open master bedroom window halfway
Alexa , ask quiet cool to close master bedroom window
